title: Eyes that hear
creator_credit: Nat Campus, Campus Film Productions and Lexington School for the Deaf
brief_description: An introduction to the work being done in schools for the deaf in America. Shows how deaf children are given a thorough vocational training to assist them to become useful citizens.
